description.p: The free and open source 3D creation suite that supports the entirety of the 3D pipeline: modeling, rigging, animation, simulation, rendering, compositing, motion tracking, and video editing.

Blender is a public project, made by hundreds of people from around the world; by studios and individual artists, professionals and hobbyists, scientists, students, VFX experts, animators, game artists, modders, and the list goes on.

ul.li: Full Vulkan support with major improvements for performance and compatibility
Faster startup times and multi-threaded shader compilation
Enhanced Geometry Nodes with support for importing multiple file formats (CSV, PLY, VDB, STL, OBJ, TXT)
New Point Cloud object type for representing large numbers of individual points in 3D space
Improved Compositor with procedural texture nodes and common nodes from Shader and Geometry Nodes
Grease Pencil render pass and supersampling anti-aliasing (SSAA) for better line quality
UV visibility in all object modes, not just Edit Mode
Enhanced Video Sequencer with HDR support and improved cache
Shadow terminator bias in EEVEE to eliminate self-shadowing artifacts
Color randomization in Sculpt, Vertex Paint, and Texture Paint modes
Geometry Nodes attribute domain interpolation up to 7x faster
Liquid simulation up to 1.5x faster
Faster texture loading and optimized startup process
Improved trimming performance in Sculpt mode with new Manifold solver
EEVEE has been completely rewritten from scratch to allow global illumination, displacement, better SSS, viewport motion blur, and more.
Cycles has been upgraded to make your renders look better and faster.
Add-ons and themes have received a significant overhaul and are now unified as Extensions.
A new community-managed website for sharing and discovering Blender extensions.
Khronos PBR Neutral Tone Mapper has been added.
Polyline has been added to the family of gestures (lasso, box, and line).
A new socket type for matrices is available for transformations using nodes.
It is now possible to use Node Tools with information about the viewport and mouse position in the node tree.
The Video Sequencer has updated its design, tools, and performance.
Collections can now specify their own exporters, making it easier to repeatedly export assets, such as glTF or USD, for studio pipelines.
Geometry nodes can now be baked & New Geometry nodes
New Smooth by Angle modifier replaced Auto Smooth
OpenImageDenoise is now GPU accelerated
A new way for inserting animation keyframes and generating motion paths
New graph editor operators & bake channels
More USD features & VFX Reference Platform 2024 compliance
The viewport compositor now supports more nodes
Faster video sequencer with improved image filtering
AMD GPU rendering support added for RDNA3 generation APUs
Linux CPU rendering performance was improved by about 5% across benchmarks
Better bone collections, switch bones while weight painting
Fix multiple bugs
Fix multiple bugs
More geometry nodes
Mask loops & patterns
Mask textures
Line art modifier
New fill tool in Greasepencil
EEVEE depth of field
Interpolate tool rewritten
Better volumetrics in EEVEE
Cycles persistence
